title: Python Programming Assignment
description: Create a basic calculator using Python with functions for add, subtract, multiply, and divide operations.

title: Data Structures Quiz
description: Online quiz covering arrays, linked lists, and basic algorithmic complexity.

title: Derivative Practice Problems
description: Complete exercises 1-30 from Chapter 3 on derivatives and limits.

title: Midterm Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering limits, derivatives, and applications.

title: Argumentative Essay
description: Write a 5-page argumentative essay on the topic of social media's impact on modern communication.

title: Grammar and Style Quiz
description: Quiz on MLA citation format, grammar rules, and writing style guidelines.

title: Lab Report - Motion and Forces
description: Write a detailed lab report analyzing the relationship between force, mass, and acceleration.

title: Problem Set Chapter 5
description: Solve physics problems related to energy, work, and power concepts.

title: Research Paper - Cognitive Psychology
description: Research and write a 8-page paper on a specific topic in cognitive psychology with at least 10 academic sources.

title: Chapter 4 Discussion Post
description: Participate in online discussion about learning theories and provide thoughtful responses to classmates.

title: Binary Search Tree Implementation
description: Implement a complete binary search tree in Java with insert, delete, and search operations.

title: Algorithm Complexity Analysis
description: Analyze the time and space complexity of various sorting algorithms and write a comparative report.
